name: Volcano Star
description:
Defeat the volcano to save the decaying star fairy within!

A simple sandbox game made for a birthday present.

Controls:
  • fullscreen: F1
  • movement: W, A, S, and D
  • open pack: E
  • use tool: left mouse button
  • save: P (the game auto-saves when you close the window)
  • load last save: O
  • Starbits and Glowstones are equipable on the top right when in the pack menu.

Created with love(2D).

The source code is available on Github. Feel free to submit issues for bugs or ideas you would like to see in the game.

Feedback is greatly appreciated!
